attributes.action: Give small businesses more financial help so they don’t end forever!!
attributes.additional_details: Consider giving another grant for small businesses that have been forced to close! These places are going to end up going down the pan! All for something which has been completely out of there control we have been forced to close with no notice and shocking financial help we not only need to think of the nhs but all the other people who are struggling through this pandemic make things easier for everyone! All businesses have spent a fortune to be covid secure so they can open safely with no help
attributes.background: Please help small businesses financially the £10,000 grant was a great help to start with but that doesn’t cover much.The further £1300 for the second lockdown was a help but most businesses need a lot more than that. None of this is anyone’s fault but we aren’t given a choice!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Give business with prolonged closure due to Covid-19 additional grant funding: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329210

Extend the grants for small business who receive SBRR by a further £5000: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548846

Since you started your petition the Government has announced £4.6 billion in new lockdown grants to support businesses and protect jobs: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/46-billion-in-new-lockdown-grants-to-support-businesses-and-protect-jobs
